*What is an event?

An event is triggered when an end user enters or exits a geofence defined on the platform.

A typical event is triggered, when an end user walks into a geofenced area, and mobile content is delivered to their device. In order to assess the amount of triggered events per day, one needs to estimate the amount of app users in the premises, the amount of geofences used for triggering and the frequency of triggering. For example, if an app has 1000 users present in the premises, 2 geofences and each user visits the venue once a week, you would trigger around 8550 event per day and need the gold plan.
